content: no gauge listed for the fingering weight version there is a newer pattern pictured available for worsted weight yarn bunny hop pixie hat 1 which uses bunny hop angora blend 113 yds and us 7 / 4 5 mm needles 14 sts = 2&quot a bulky weight version for adults is also available 2 a german version - with permission from crystal palace - is available since june 2011 at kirschkernzeit 3 knitted with lang yarns omega 3 5mm eine deutschsprachige version - mit genehmigung von crystal palace - ist seit juni 2011 erhältlich bei kirschkernzeit 4 gestrickt aus lang yarns omega 3 5mm 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bunny-hop-baby-pixie-hat 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pixie-ribbed-hat-adult 3 http //www kirschkernzeit chain/wordpress/ p=668 4 http //www kirschkernzeit chain/wordpress/ p=668
